hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #hearts#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
